alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 10:25PM CDT until July 28 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL DE KALB AND KANE COUNTIES... At 1024 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wayne to near Maple Park to Shabbona, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elgin, DeKalb, Bartlett, Carpentersville, St. Charles, Algonquin, Huntley, Geneva, Sycamore, Campton Hills, Shabbona, South Elgin, Sugar Grove, Pingree Grove, Gilberts, West Dundee, Hampshire, Elburn, Cortland and Barrington Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
